moulberrystweaks.config.gameplay.confirm: Adds a confirmation when disconnecting from a server to avoid accidental disconnects
moulberrystweaks.config.gameplay.correct: The attack indicator bar is inaccurate. It resets internally whenever you swing your arms, but will still visually show a full bar. This feature makes the attack indicator visually show the correct value
moulberrystweaks.config.gameplay.prevent: Prevents the server from closing your pause screen and other sub-screens
Speeds up the resource loading overlay by removing the fade out animation
Removes the background from the resource loading overlay
moulberrystweaks.config.resource_pack.au: Automatically reloads resourcepacks when a file in the folder is changed
moulberrystweaks.config.resource_pack.di: Disables the warning screen when toggling resourcepacks with the wrong version
moulberrystweaks.config.debugging.log_pa: Prints the stacktrace of a packet exception, useful for debugging
moulberrystweaks.config.debugging.ignore: If the narrator can't be loaded, stop the game from complaining about it
moulberrystweaks.config.debugging.invent: Keybind to open a widget showing item component data
Keybind to open a widget showing incoming and outgoing inventory packets. Useful for server developers
moulberrystweaks.config.debugging.debug_: Sends debug movement data to the server every tick. Useful for anticheat developers (moulberrystweaks:debug_movement_data)
moulberrystweaks.config.debugging.add_op: Adds an "Open Report File" button to the disconnect screen that directly opens the report file
moulberrystweaks.config.commands.auto_va: Command to automatically vanish players that are nearby. Useful for parkour servers so you can see where to go
moulberrystweaks.config.commands.dump_he: Prints the serialized json of the item you are holding. Useful for developers
moulberrystweaks.config.commands.generat: Writes a file containing the width of every font character. Useful for developers of external tools/software
moulberrystweaks.config.commands.dump_pl: Dumps the entity attributes of the player entity. Useful for developers
moulberrystweaks.config.commands.debug_r: Allows hiding/clearing debug renders sent by the server using the debug_render protocol. Useful for developers
moulberrystweaks.config.commands.set_lat: Adds additional latency between the client and server. Useful for testing servers with high ping. Requires operator permissions
